Question: In which locations was the movie 'Wake Up Sid' (2009) primarily filmed?
Options:
A. South Mumbai
B. Bandra
C. Delhi
D. Pune

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie 'Wake Up Sid' (2009) and its college sequence?
Options:
A. The college sequence was filmed at H. R. College of Commerce and Economics.
B. The movie was shot in Mumbai.
C. The college sequence features students from various colleges.
D. Wake Up Sid was released in 2008.
Answer: The college sequence was filmed at H. R. College of Commerce and Economics., The movie was shot in Mumbai.
